关于

远方是梦想

我们真的认识这个世界吗?

Hi，我是王钊，目前就职于西安电子科技大学，电子工程学院，讲师，博士后，Github、Gitee。

联络信息

E-mail: wangzhao@xidian.edu.cn

主要研究方向

  • 多目标优化
  • 进化算法
  • 深度学习
  • 复杂网络
  • 辐射源识别

主要发表的论文

[1] A Similarity-Based Multiobjective Evolutionary Algorithm for Deployment Optimization of Near Space Communication System, Maoguo Gong (Ph. D supervisor), Zhao Wang, Zexuan Zhu, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation, Vol. 21, No. 6, 2016: 878-897. （中科院SCI分区一区，2019IF：8.124）.

[2] Dynamic Deployment Optimization of Near Space Communication System Using a Novel Estimation of Distribution Algorithm, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Applied Soft Computing, Vol. 78, 2019: 569-582. （中科院SCI分区二区，2019IF：3.907）.

[3] A Memetic Algorithm based on MOEA/D for Near Space Communication System Deployment Optimization on Tide User Model, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Yu Lei, Shanfeng Wang, Linzhi Su, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 3614-3621.

[4] Deployment Optimization of Near Space Airships based on MOEA/D with Local Search, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Qing Cai, Lijia Ma, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2014: 2345-2352.

[5] Decision Variable Analysis based on Distributed Computing, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Tian Xie, International Conference on Bio-Inspired Computing: Theories and Applications, 2017: 447-455.

[6] Detecting Multiple Changes from Multi-Temporal Images by Using Stacked Denosing Autoencoder Based Change Vector Analysis. Linzhi Su, Jiao Shi, Puzhao Zhang, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, International Joint Conference on Neural Networks. 2016: 1269-1276.

[7] A Novel Bi-Objective Model with Particle Swarm Optimizer for Structural Balance Analytics in Social Networks, Jianan Yan, Shasha Ruan, Qing Cai, Jiao Shi, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 728-735.

[8] Enhancing Evolutionary Multifactorial Optimization based on Particle Swarm Optimization, Tian Xie, Maoguo Gong, Zedong Tang, Yu Lei, Jia Liu, Zhao Wang, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 1658-1665.

[9] Deep Community Detection based on Memetic Algorithm, Shanfeng Wang, Maoguo Gong, Bo Shen, Zhao Wang, Qing Cai, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2015: 648-655.

[10] A Memetic Algorithm based on Immune Multi-Objective Optimization for Flexible Job-shop Scheduling Problems,Jingjing Ma, Yu Lei, Zhao Wang, Licheng Jiao, Ruochen Liu. IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2014:58-65.

基金

目前主持重点实验室基金一项

Do we know this world?

Hi, I am Zhao Wang, I am a full time postdocs and lecturer in Xidian University, Github、Gitee.

Contact

E-mail: wangzhao@xidian.edu.cn

Research Topics

  • Multiobjective Optimization
  • Evolutionary Algorithm
  • Deep Learning
  • Complex Network
  • Emitter Recognization

Publications

[1] A Similarity-Based Multiobjective Evolutionary Algorithm for Deployment Optimization of Near Space Communication System, Maoguo Gong (Ph. D supervisor), Zhao Wang, Zexuan Zhu, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation, Vol. 21, No. 6, 2016: 878-897. (2019IF：8.124).

[2] Dynamic Deployment Optimization of Near Space Communication System Using a Novel Estimation of Distribution Algorithm, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Applied Soft Computing, Vol. 78, 2019: 569-582. (2019IF：3.907).

[3] A Memetic Algorithm based on MOEA/D for Near Space Communication System Deployment Optimization on Tide User Model, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Yu Lei, Shanfeng Wang, Linzhi Su, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 3614-3621.

[4] Deployment Optimization of Near Space Airships based on MOEA/D with Local Search, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Qing Cai, Lijia Ma, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2014: 2345-2352.

[5] Decision Variable Analysis based on Distributed Computing, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, Tian Xie, International Conference on Bio-Inspired Computing: Theories and Applications, 2017: 447-455.

[6] Detecting Multiple Changes from Multi-Temporal Images by Using Stacked Denosing Autoencoder Based Change Vector Analysis. Linzhi Su, Jiao Shi, Puzhao Zhang, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, International Joint Conference on Neural Networks. 2016: 1269-1276.

[7] A Novel Bi-Objective Model with Particle Swarm Optimizer for Structural Balance Analytics in Social Networks, Jianan Yan, Shasha Ruan, Qing Cai, Jiao Shi, Zhao Wang, Maoguo Gong, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 728-735.

[8] Enhancing Evolutionary Multifactorial Optimization based on Particle Swarm Optimization, Tian Xie, Maoguo Gong, Zedong Tang, Yu Lei, Jia Liu, Zhao Wang, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2016: 1658-1665.

[9] Deep Community Detection based on Memetic Algorithm, Shanfeng Wang, Maoguo Gong, Bo Shen, Zhao Wang, Qing Cai, Licheng Jiao, IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2015: 648-655.

[10] A Memetic Algorithm based on Immune Multi-Objective Optimization for Flexible Job-shop Scheduling Problems,Jingjing Ma, Yu Lei, Zhao Wang, Licheng Jiao, Ruochen Liu. IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation, 2014:58-65.
